content: available in english us terminology --------------------------------------------------------------- about the pattern mini happy grinch amigurumi crochet pattern is a printable version of my free video tutorial available on little crochet farm youtube channel contains detailed instructions for each row instant pdf pattern download will be available immediately after the confirmation of the payment you can see in the download link in the details of your order --------------------------------------------------------------- about the amigurumi this mini happy grinch amigurumi it s part of the christmas ornaments collection crocheted with needle size 1 75 or 2mm the finished size of this amigurumi crochet toy is about 11cm the material used for this toy is cotton and the stuffing material is polyester hypoallergenic ---------------------------------------------------------------- additional information this amigurumi crochet pattern is for those who have basic crochet skills if you are a beginner don t worry this pattern has a video tutorial that will help you to complete it and you have any questions regarding this pattern get in contact with me i will be happy to help you finish your amigurumi crochet toy
